review: I use this in my bathroom. It's pretty loud so it's easy to hear while your taking a shower. That said however I'm upgrading to the Echo Dot 4th Generation with the clock. It's a sphere and releasing in October or November. The 3rd Gen Dot I have now has the clock on it.
I got one when they came out. Don't use it very much but it sounds very good so it's nice to have on my desk for some music here and there. But for smart home control I've got Alexa devices.
